children.value: Zippy little utilities for your frameworks.
All the parts you don't want to write for
Edit your theme content and appearance with live-preview within
Use built-in components (or your own!) inside your content.
Enjoy the ease and simplicity of Markdown and discover
. Choose between static generation, on-demand rendering (Node) or edge-side rendering on
Customize the whole design, or add components using slots - you can make Docus your own.

contents.title: Getting Started
contents.description: From your Markdown files to a deployed website in few minutes.

children.value: From your Markdown files to a deployed website in few minutes.

contents.title: What are modifiers?
contents.description: Modifiers are a key feature of Mods that allow you to easily modify and enhance your content. They are small pieces of code that can be applied to your JS to add functionality, validation or style.

children.value: Modifiers are a key feature of Mods that allow you to easily modify and enhance your content. They are small pieces of code that can be applied to your JS to add functionality, validation or style.

contents.title: Writing Pages
contents.description: Docus is made to let you write all your content in Markdown and Vue components with the MDC syntax.

children.value: Docus is made to let you write all your content in Markdown and Vue components with the MDC syntax.
folder will be mapped to a route.
Docus supports multiple Front-matter attributes for pages.

props.code: readingTime('Once, in a vibrant online forum, lived Mod Max, guardian of digital harmony. Max cherished his old scooter, Swift, a symbol of freedom. Navigating both virtual and real worlds, they became legends. Trolls quivered, posts flourished, and lanes whizzed by. Swift’s wheels spun tales, and Max’s keys kept peace. Together, they discovered uncharted threads and hidden lanes. Their journey, an endless adventure, painted pixels and pavements with stories of unity and exhilaration, leaving a trail for all in the intertwined realms of screens and streets.')

children.value: 'Once, in a vibrant online forum, lived Mod Max, guardian of digital harmony. Max cherished his old scooter, Swift, a symbol of freedom. Navigating both virtual and real worlds, they became legends. Trolls quivered, posts flourished, and lanes whizzed by. Swift’s wheels spun tales, and Max’s keys kept peace. Together, they discovered uncharted threads and hidden lanes. Their journey, an endless adventure, painted pixels and pavements with stories of unity and exhilaration, leaving a trail for all in the intertwined realms of screens and streets.'
Converts a number to a string with ordinal suffix.

Removes spaces and capitalizes the first letter of each word.
Replaces spaces with underscores and converts to lowercase.
Replaces spaces with hyphens and converts to lowercase.
Converts to title case by capitalizing the first letter of each word.
Converts to sentence case by capitalizing the first letter of the first word.

Removes a prefix from a string if it starts with the prefix.
Adds a suffix to a string if it doesn't already end with the suffix.
Removes a suffix from a string if it ends with the suffix.
Adds a prefix and suffix to a string if it doesn't already start and end with them.
Converts a string to title case following the Chicago Manual of Style rules.
